Getting started with scatterbars

Jean Fan

2024-07-01

Source: vignettes/getting-started-with-scatterbars.Rmd
getting-started-with-scatterbars.Rmd
library(scatterbar)
data("deconProp")
data("pos")

plot(pos)

scatterbar::create_scatterbar(deconProp, pos)
